IF (NOT JANSSON_FOUND)
   MESSAGE("Building jansson with libpndman")
   SET(JANSSON_BUILD_DOCS OFF CACHE BOOL "Disable docs build")
   SET(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF CACHE BOOL "Static jansson")
   # SET(JANSSON_BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF CACHE BOOL "Static jansson")
   SET(JANSSON_WITHOUT_TESTS ON CACHE BOOL "Without tests")
   SET(JANSSON_INCLUDE_DIRS) # unset
   SET(JANSSSON_LIBRARIES) # unset
   ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(jansson EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
   LIST(APPEND LIBPNDMAN_INCL ${JANSSON_INCLUDE_DIRS})
   LIST(APPEND LIBPNDMAN_LINK ${JANSSON_LIBRARIES})
ENDIF ()

SET(LIBPNDMAN_STATIC_INCL ${LIBPNDMAN_INCL} CACHE STRING "(internal) libpndman static includes")
SET(LIBPNDMAN_STATIC_LINK ${LIBPNDMAN_LINK} CACHE STRING "(internal) libpndman static linkage")
